name: h3
description: Discover the 2025 Marucci Code Drop 10 USA Baseball Bat, engineered for peak performance with its mid-loaded swing feel and 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter. This bat features a striking green and black colorway and is crafted with Marucci's revolutionary AZ75 Alloy for all-season durability. Equipped with a 2nd-Gen AV2 knob, it offers a harmonic dampening system that enhances overall feel during play. The innovative ring-free barrel construction and multi-variable wall design provide an expanded sweet spot and thinner walls, ensuring more forgiving off-centered hits. Certified for USA Baseball, this bat is designed to elevate your game with unmatched precision and power. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
